== Track description ==

{{Music disclaimer}}
[[File:Lilypad.ogg]]
</br>This track shares same melody as [[Amos Roddy]]'s previously worked game's musics. Previously seen in ''[[Wikipedia:Citizen Sleeper|Citizen Sleeper]]''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s ''Relink''(Track 20), ''Possible Futures''(Track 23), and ''[[Wikipedia:Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector|Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector]]''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s ''Imagined Futures''(Track 34). With electronic instrument and ambient composition style that resembles to such ''Citizen Sleeper'' series' track.

=== Raw music files ===
{{IN|je}}, the music files can be found in {{code|[[.minecraft]]/assets/objects}}.{{fn|The files in the <samp>objects</samp> folder are hashed. To locate the music files, see [[Tutorial:Sound directory]].}}

{{IN|be}} and ''[[Minecraft Education]]'', it can be found in:

* Mobile: {{code|[[com.mojang]]/resource_packs/music/vanilla_music/sounds/music/game/}}
* Windows: {{code|%PROGRAMFILES%\WindowsApps\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_''<version>''_x64_8wekyb3d8bbwe\data\resource_packs\vanilla_music\sounds\music\game}}

All music files are in {{w|Vorbis|Ogg Vorbis}}.
